artist: Painter: After Pieter Claesz Soutman; Engraver: Antoine van der Does; Publisher: Jan Meyssens
description: half length portrait of man facing right and looking out; wearing white ruff and cloak; right hand at waist holding fob
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: JACOBUS MATHAM/ Beau fils de Henri Goltz fut né a Harlem l\'an 1571 le 15d Octob./ mourut 1631 le 20 Januier/ Ant. Vander Does sculp   P. Soutman Pinx. J. Meyssens excud  |on sheet in pencil 2-33
title: Portrait of Jacobus Matham
